trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Cweilsaem has a favor to ask.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the small package to W'sondidi.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_TODO_01<tab>Drink the golden syrup near W'sondidi.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Cweilsaem.

TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_CWEILSAEM_000_000<tab>It's <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, isn't it? I was about to head to Kokkol's Forge to drop something off, but I think you'd be more welcome than I.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_CWEILSAEM_000_001<tab>As it turns out, the recipient is something of an admirer of yours. I'm sure she'd be thrilled to have you make the delivery.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_CWEILSAEM_000_002<tab>Thank you! Here's the package, all set to be delivered to W'sondidi.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_CWEILSAEM_000_005<tab>W'sondidi is waiting for her delivery at Kokkol's Forge. I wish I could see the look on her face when she realizes it's you!
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_010<tab>Hello th─<var 1A 02 /var>eep<var 1A 01 /var>! It's you! The one and only <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Am I dreaming?
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_011<tab>A delivery for me? But why would someone as famous and important as you be delivering my package?
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_012<tab>Oh, now I'm just being rude. I must thank you properly! If only I had known you'd be coming, I could have prepared something for you...
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_013<tab>Silly me, there's something for you right here! This package contains a bottle of golden syrup. It's yours if you want it.

TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_014<tab>It's an alchemical medicine to rejuvenate the wearied body. You must need something like that after running around and saving the <var 1A 02 /var>entire world<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_015<tab>I won't hear no for an answer, so drink it down! You deserve it far more than I do!
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_018<tab>Please drink the syrup before you go. I'd never forgive myself if this delivery contributed to your exhaustion.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_SYSTEM_000_019<tab>W'sondidi will be disappointed if you do not drink the medicine where she can see you.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The medicine is much sweeter than you were expecting.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_A1_000_001<tab>It's delicious!
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_A1_000_002<tab>The taste is a bit...much.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_021<tab>I'm glad! I hope it nourishes your body along with pleasing your palate.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_022<tab>It <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> medicine, after all. Regardless of the flavor, I hope it does your body some good.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_023<tab>That reminds me, I had your comrade G'raha try some as well.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_024<tab>He seemed to quite enjoy it─said it was like drinking sweet ambrosia. I couldn't help but wonder what sort of medicine he had been forced to drink before...

TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_025<tab>Anyway, I'm afraid that's all I have to offer you. I swear, if Cweilsaem doesn't compensate you properly I just might─ Well, never mind that! Please take proper care of yourself out there.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_WSONDIDI_000_028<tab>Make sure Cweilsaem pays you properly!
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_CWEILSAEM_000_030<tab>All finished, then? She works herself too hard, that W'sondidi. The medicine I sent should be good for her.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_CWEILSAEM_100_030<tab>Though I must say, you're looking rather more chipper than when you left.
TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_CWEILSAEM_200_030<tab>Now that I look at you, you don't look too well yourself. Are you feeling all right?

TEXT_AKTKZI007_04322_CWEILSAEM_000_031<tab>What? She gave the syrup to you? Well, if that cheered her up, I suppose that's as good as any medicine. In any case, here's a little something as thanks for your help.
